verses.verse: <S%H3101>Joash<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6645>Zibiah,<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>
<S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> for him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives;<s%> and he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
It happened <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3101>this,<s%> that Joash <S%H3820>intended<s%> to <S%H2318>restore<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3318>them,<s%> "Go out to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> all Israel <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year.<s%> See that you <S%H4116>expedite<s%> this <S%H1697>matter.<s%>" However the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H4116>didn't<s%> do it right away.

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1875>him,<s%> "Why haven't you required of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to bring <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H4864>tax<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony?<s%>"

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%> that <S%H4849>wicked<s%> <S%H6555>woman,<s%> had broken up the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and they also <S%H6213>gave<s%> all the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H1168>Baals.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H727>chest,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H2351>outside<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H6963>proclamation<s%> through <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H935>in<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H4864>tax<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> laid on <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

All the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and brought <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H727>chest,<s%> until they had made an <S%H3615>end.<s%>

It was <S%H6256>so,<s%> that whenever the <S%H727>chest<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6486>officers<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H6496>officer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> the <S%H727>chest,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H5375>it,<s%> and carried it to its <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%> Thus they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to such as <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> to <S%H2318>restore<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and also such as <S%H2796>worked<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

So the <S%H4399>workmen<s%> <S%H6213>worked,<s%> and the <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H5927>repairing<s%> went <S%H724>forward<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and they <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in its <S%H4971>state,<s%> and strengthened <S%H553>it.<s%>

When they had <S%H3615>made<s%> an <S%H935>end,<s%> they brought the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> of which were <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even <S%H3627>vessels<s%> with which to <S%H8335>minister<s%> and to <S%H5927>offer,<s%> and <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver.<s%> They <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada.<s%>

But <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> grew <S%H2204>old<s%> and was <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died;<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was he when he <S%H4194>died.<s%>

They <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> among the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> because he had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and toward <S%H430>God<s%> and his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> listened to <S%H8085>them.<s%>

They <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the <S%H6091>idols:<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> came on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for this their <S%H819>guiltiness.<s%>
Yet he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H7725>them,<s%> to bring them again to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H5749>testified<s%> against <S%H238>them:<s%> but they would not give ear.

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> on <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> above the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Thus says <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5674><s%> 'Why do you disobey the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> so that you <S%H6743>can't<s%> prosper? Because you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he has also forsaken <S%H5800>you.<s%>'"

They <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H7275>him,<s%> and stoned him with <S%H68>stones<s%> at the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> which <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2026>him,<s%> but killed his <S%H1121>son.<s%> When he <S%H4194>died,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> at <S%H1875>it,<s%> and repay it."

It happened at the <S%H8622>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> that the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H935>him:<s%> and they came to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> all their <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

For the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H4705>small<s%> company of <S%H582>men;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%> So they <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgment<s%> on <S%H3101>Joash.<s%>

When they were <S%H3212>departed<s%> for <S%H5800>him<s%> (for they left him <S%H7227>very<s%> <S%H4251>sick<s%>), his own <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against him for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> him on his <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> but they <S%H6912>didn't<s%> bury him in the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

These are those who <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H2066>him:<s%> Zabad the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8100>Shimeath<s%> the <S%H5985>Ammonitess,<s%> and <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8116>Shimrith<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabitess.<s%>

Now concerning his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H7235>greatness<s%> of the <S%H4853>burdens<s%> laid on <S%H3247>him,<s%> and the rebuilding of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H4097>commentary<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings.<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
